name: unattached
content:
unattached adjective
(SINGLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not married or not having a relationship with anyone; single: He's gorgeous, he has his own house and, what's more, he's unattached.

unattached adjective
(NOT CONNECTED)
not physically joined to something else: The cover of the book was stained and almost completely unattached.
not feeling connected to a person, group, or idea: Feeling unattached to the community is one of the risk factors for drug abuse.
